organizations: Fujikura Golf Shafts Capture LPGA Keb Hanan Bank Championship

thread.title: Fujikura Golf Shafts Played to Capture Two Victories and Kicks Off the New PGA Tour Season Ranked as #1
thread.title_full: Fujikura Golf Shafts Played to Capture Two Victories and Kicks Off the New PGA Tour Season Ranked as #1

title: Fujikura Golf Shafts Played to Capture Two Victories and Kicks Off the New PGA Tour Season Ranked as #1
text: Fujikura Golf Shafts Played to Capture Two Victories and Kicks Off the New PGA Tour Season Ranked as #1 Fujikura Golf Shafts Capture LPGA Keb Hanan Bank Championship and Fiji International Titles on the Same Weekend the Fujikura Driver Count Dominates at the PGA Tour Frys.com Tournament VISTA, CA, October 21,   Fujikura Golf, recognized for designing and producing the world's best performance golf shafts, has entered into the new PGA/LPGA Tour season with some impressive results; two championship titles, #1 driver ranking, seven Top-10 finishes on the LPGA Tour and four Top-Ten finishes on the PGA Tour - all confirmed by golf equipment reporting agency, the Darrell Survey. "This weekend marks a historic high point for Fujikura Golf. Our success on tour is a honorable achievement and testament to our commitment to making superior products." stated Fujikura President and COO, David Schnider. Fujikura Golf and its development on the LPGA Tour is directly related to this Keb Hanan Bank win and seven Top-10 finishes. Fujikura's Driver Shaft count has progressed from 552 in 2013 to 799 in 2015 and the Fujikura Wood Shaft count has grown from 2,428 in 2013 to 2,999. This evolution is credited to the to the Fujikura Speeder brand shaft which is rated #1 on the LPGA Tour for driving accuracy with close to 90% fairways hit - three years in a row. The Speeder is the most played golf shaft on the LPGA Tour. The PRO Series and SIX shafts have been among the most popular new shafts played on the tour. The winner of this past weekend's tournament played with the Fujikura SIX shaft. Advancement for Fujikura Golf on the PGA Tour continues to be at an unprecedented high. During the entire Fed Ex Cup Series Fujikura was the #1 wood shaft brand and manufacturer at every Fed Ex Cup event in 2015. The company has also obtained the #1 wood shaft brand count for the past 14 of the last 17 weeks. And, the momentum continues into the new PGA Tour season. Fujikura Golf celebrated a global title with a win at the Fiji International where a PGA Professional and staunch supporter of Fujikura played a Speeder Evolution to claim the title by four strokes. The company was also ranked as the #1 driver played at the Frys.com tournament and four Top-10 finishes were achieved at the Frys.com playing a Fujikura Golf Shaft. The Fujikura Shafts played by the LPGA Keb Hana Bank and Fiji International Champions include a variety of models and specifications but the one constant factor in ALL of the golf shafts is they were developed with enso technology.About enso Technology: enso is an advanced, proprietary technology that measures actionable, pre-impact club data to facilitate the design of the most accurate and powerful golf shafts for all golfers. It was developed in 2009 with then partner Vicon Motion Capture Systems as a state-of-the-art high, speed 3D motion capture measurement system which measures the club (head, shaft, handle) at sub-millimeter accuracy prior to impact. Fujikura has gathered years of data over the past five years measuring different swings from all types of golfers and now is using this intelligence to deliver the head to ball ratios FASTER and more efficient than ever before. Fujikura is the only shaft company with this innovative technology. About Fujikura Golf: Fujikura is known for designing and producing the world's best performance golf shafts which is credited to their engineering team, enso technology and the professional tour support the company receives from the PGA, Web.com, LPGA and Champions Tour. These critical components have contributed greatly to Fujikura garnering the #1 Driver Shaft, #1 Wood Shaft, #1 Hybrid Shaft used on the professional tours. The company is also distinguished as a primary supplier to many national golf club brands offering both proprietary and brand product shaft designs. Fujikura products also can be custom fit through its network of over 900 Charter Dealers worldwide. Custom fit shafts are used by 100% of Tour professionals but Amateur and everyday golfers can take advantage of this same opportunity to fit their unique swing profile. In fact, 99% of golfers fit with Fujikura Shafts instantly gain more yards. To learn more about Fujikura, visit www.fujikuragolf.com or Like us on Facebook www.facebook.com/fujikuragolf Follow us on twitter @FujikuraonTour Follow us on Instagram #FujikuraGolf # # # Read more Press Releases from Vanessa Price:
